Introduction¶

Tutorials and API¶

  • API

Dependencies¶

CaCTus is being developed in Python 3.9 but should work on all versions >=3.4. CaCTus is written mostly in python.

The following Python modules are required:

  • numpy

For testing you will require nose or pytest .

Installation¶

CaCTus can be installed in a variety of ways – using conda, pip or by directly cloning the repository. If you are having trouble installing or running MAGPIE we recommend using the conda install as this will setup the environment.

  1. By cloning the github repository:

    git clone https://github.com/knaidoo29/cactus.git
cd magpie
python setup.py build
python setup.py install

Once this is done you should be able to call CaCTus from python:

import cactus

Support¶

If you have any issues with the code or want to suggest ways to improve it please open a new issue (here) or (if you don’t have a github account) email krishna.naidoo.11@ucl.ac.uk.
